sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_slrp_eligibility_circumstances"> <x_slrp_eligibility_circumstances action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <circumstance>I was formerly assigned to a post designated for 20% or greater hardship differential or for danger pay during the current open season timeframe of March 1 - July 31 (**provide date of rotation from qualifying post).</circumstance> <number>EL0001004</number> <sys_class_name>x_slrp_eligibility_circumstances</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>MayfieldCE</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-26 13:15:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0d9ac4c41d144300f28f729badefa889</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>MayfieldCE</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-26 13:15:48</sys_updated_on> </x_slrp_eligibility_circumstances> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: I was formerly assigned to a post designated for 20% or greater hardship differential or for danger pay during the current open season timeframe of March 1 - July 31 (**provide date of rotation from qualifying post).
